alert.note: Alert for Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 4:30AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog Possible This Morning... Areas of fog (some locally dense) are expected to develop across portions of the area this morning. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around 1 mile or less, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities to one-half of a mile at times. Fog is expected to linger through mid-morning. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory may be warranted. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.
